price: 73. Il leur sera dit ensuite : « Où sont donc ceux que vous prêtiez comme associés
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
